title: Narrative-Based Language Proficiency Development Program for Professional English Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Communication Skills and Understanding of Professional Work Environments
context.additional_context: A course for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to enhance English communication skills needed in work environments, with learning through VR simulations to experience real-world scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can use context-appropriate English expressions in VR scenarios (e.g., meetings, negotiations, customer consultations) for professional fields with ≥80% accuracy.
Learners evaluate academic and job-related English proficiency through performance tasks based on English Learner Proficiency Standards (ELP/D).
Learners can reflect on their language performance through peer feedback and propose ≥3 improvement strategies.

resources: Leveled Customized Worksheets for English Learners
Mobile App with Voice Recording/Playback Functionality
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
